name: F!shing
description:
F!shing is a fast-paced arcade game of near-misses, fish-flinging, and accidental litter collection!

Zip around procedurally generated lakes, catching as many fish as you can within the time limit. Snatch valuable pearls out of the mouths of clams, and race against hungry sharks!

Compete with friends and enemies worldwide in the Lake of the Day challenge!

New in version 1.4:

  • New 'modifiers' system means more variety between games.
  • Earn combo multipliers with fast catching, for even higher scores.
  • Improved support for the XBOX 360 controller.
  • More graphical polish.
  • Other minor tweaks and bug fixes.

For more details, see the site at http://samatkins.co.uk/fishing/.

Mac and Linux:

The game should work on anything that can run Java, so I've marked it as being available on Mac and Linux. HOWEVER, I cannot currently ensure that there will be no problems. If you do have trouble, please email me, so I can sort things out. :)
